channel.title: Events on CUPE Hospitals
channel.description: Recent content in Events on CUPE Hospitals

item.title: CUPE Eastern Ontario RPN Conference: Dec 1, 2017
item.description:
CUPE local 1974, representing staff at Kingston Health Sciences, is pleased to sponsor an RPN conference for eastern Ontario RPNs.
Date: December 1 Time: 10 a.m.- 4 p.m. Location: City Hall, 216 Ontario Street, Kingston Agenda Violence and hospital nursing Bargaining demands for registered practical nurses in 2017 Expanded scope of practice for RPNs recently announced by the College of Nurses

item.title: St. Mike's Information Sessions October 10 & 17, 2017
item.description: Coffee and light snacks will be served. October 10: 10am-11pm Join us at the Pantages Hotel October 17: 10am-4pm Join us at the Starbucks at 82 Adelaide Street East Ask us your questions what is a union and what do unions do? why did the employer send me a letter about unionization? what are my rights in the workplace? how can I get involved? Lean more about the St.

item.title: UHN Information Sessions October 11 & 12, 2017
item.description: Coffee and light snacks will be served. UHN Employees October 11: 10am-4pm Jimmy’s Coffee at 84 Gerrard Street UHN Western Hospital Employees October 12: 10am-4pm Tim Hortons at 750 Dundas Street West Ask us your questions what is a union and what do unions do? why did the employer send me a letter about unionization? what are my rights in the workplace? how can I get involved?

item.title: University Health Network Drop-ins August 30, Sept 6, 13
item.description: Coffee and light snacks will be served. When: August 30 September 6 September 13 Time: 10:00 am – 2:00 pm (drop in anytime) Location: Jimmy’s Coffee (3 rd floor) - 84 Gerrard Street West (north side of Gerrard between Elizabeth and Bay) Ask us… Do you have questions? what is a union and what do unions do? why did the employer send me a letter about unionization?

item.title: Markham Stouffville Hospital Clerical Employees Information Meeting (Aug 15, 2017)
item.description: CUPE Information Meeting To All Markham Stouffville Hospital Clerical Employees You are invited to attend an information session to find out more about CUPE’s Application under the Public Sector Labour Relation Transition Act (PSLRTA) to the Ontario Labour Relations Board and what that means for non union employees at MSH. Information as well on how to join CUPE and the protection CUPE can provide during this process will also be available.

item.title: Kingston General Merger Information Session August 2-3
item.description: When: August 2 & 3 All day. Location: CUPE 1974 office at Kingston General Hospital site Ask us… There’s a lot going on at our new merged hospital (Kingston Health Sciences Centre). Many of us have questions about this process, the protections in your CUPE 1974 collective agreement and the central bargaining now underway. Drop by on August 2 and 3, tell us what’s on your mind.
